title: Park Hyung-jin
text:
Park Hyung-jin (, 24 June 1990) is a South Korean <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He currently plays for <a href="Pocheon%20Citizen%20FC">Pocheon Citizen</a>.
His elder brother, <a href="Park%20Jin-soo">Park Jin-soo</a>, is also a football player.
Statistics.
"Updated to 29 June 2021".
1
